title: Can't log in?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So whenever I try to login to the NA servers for League this comes up. It's doing the same thing to my friend also. I'm 100% connected to the internet because I'm currently watching YouTube, and so is he because he's playing a CSGO. So if anyone can help it would be appreciated. <3

replies.body: Same problem. Nothing seems to fix it that I can think of.
Seems to happen after games, particularly losses. Is riot trying to tell us to get good? Anyway, it clears up after a bit but comes back once a game is finished.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

There was an update on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, but there were server issues overnight for some regions.  Issues included some players being unable to login.  At this point, everything looks okay now!
Rito pls

Found a fix http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uQqoGVbw-cant-log-in-heres-a-fix

Worked for me and others, please upvote if it works for you so it can get attention!

Alright so I found a way that you can do it

PC:
1. Navigate to toolbar and right click the client icon and click "close window".
2. When league asks you if you want to exit, click no
3. Connection error should go away

Mac:
1. go do your doc and right click league client icon and click quit
2. When league asks you if you want to exit, click no
3. Connection error should go away

That worked for me

Wait, that actually worked. LOL!!!! wtf how?        
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
same
It looks like they are working on a fix
Same problem, hope this gets fixed soon, it's annoying.
Same problem, I can't log in and was kicked out of the game

All I know, is that when Donald enters the White House, there besn't be any of these issues no more. If so, I'll have League of Legends personally deported. Especially this "RAD" guy. Rito pls gimme game
I can't seem to login after the patch...

Hi 
Could someone help me please.
I was playing and when the game ended on the sreen was a message that someone was loged in with my account.
End then i turned of the game and tried to sign in again and couldnt.
Then i went to the lol home page tried signing in there and couldnt. Always the same like my account was deleted but when i try to make a new profile with the same email it says that it is already used by someone.
But at the same time when i try to go and recover my password i dont get any email back to do so...
I dont know what to do tried everything.
Same
I gotta ask, why are there 2 I's at the end of your name
cuz Midori was taken ;_;
D:
Such a crafty name too. It's hard to tell in this font, but I know you have it set to MidOrii. Thats pretty good :P

^THIS
I'm having the same problem, sometimes when I log in and sometimes when I'm trying to select a role in draft mode. Please fix rito.
same problem

Windows PC User. I'm having the same problems only it happens during champ select, a window telling me to either restart or shutdown. Also, in my last two games this morning I've been having connection errors that continuously interrupt gameplay and I have no clue why as this has never happened to me before. My fps and ping were fine but my game would constantly freeze. Also, the game would log me out during loading with the message "you are not connected to the internet" even though my internet is perfectly fine. If this is a problem with patch 6.23 or the new client then I hope Rito fixes this immediately.
I was having the same problem for like 10 mins then I tried running LoL as the administrator and now I'm in fine
Same problem!

Same!

First day I get to stay home from work. Figures!

Same thing happening to me, I just played a game about 30 minutes ago, then tried to go to the ingame store, and it told me I wasn't connected to the internet,  but I'm on PC not wifi, and everything else works fine, can't use old launcher either. I can log in fine, but can't type to friends, go to store, or Q up{{summoner:6}}

RADS error, was working fine on legacy client then I decided to go check out the beta client because a friend of mines was having the no internet connection error and now I received it too... word to the wise don't leave your client if you're in it already lol.  Initiated repair and still same error then tried to reinstall and then get the RADS error again.... RIP
Same here what is wrong ？？？？
I don't know what to do with my life now.....
Same issue here

Same issue here.

A lot of my friends are playing fine though.
I've Gotten a RADS Error which keeps me from Launching the Launcher. It's happening around the same time as this error, so maybe they're related?

Wait. How many of you guys are MAC users?

Just wanted to ask because I want to know if it's a MAC only problem, since my friend are fine and they don't use MAC.
I use PC.
Yeah I got the same connection issue message after a game I tried to close it and come back but I got the same message.
Same issue.
So how long until the fix comes in?

Cant connect to http server..

Got to lig on by continue typing, but still got a notification saying I'm not connected

I MUST BEING GREAT SUFFERING YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND
Same issue here.
I am too. Just hoping that as time passes, Rito will fix it.
Same problem here, hope they fix it soon.
Me too. Not sure what is going on
Having the same issue, so are a few people at the moment!
